message: The instructions for the player, like: 'Find al planes!'
succes_message: The pop-up message for if the player finds an item, like: 'You have found a plane!'
background_image_url: url to the backgroundimg. Please use start relative urls with a '/', like '/img/background.png'

planes.image: Url to the img. please start relative urls with a '/', like: '/img/plane1.png'
Url to the img. please start relative urls with a '/', like: '/img/plane1.png'
